hero.mainCopy: The Textbook of Korea's Immigration Control Act, Sejoong Law Firm Sets the Standard.
hero.subCopy: Led by Managing Partner Lee Sang-guk, Ph.D., who combines theory and practice, along with experts in each field, we provide clear solutions from the most complex immigration administration to challenging civil and criminal disputes.

authority.title: 01. The Authority
authority.description: Led by Managing Partner Lee Sang-guk, Ph.D., author of 《Immigration Control Act》, we are the mecca of administrative and immigration litigation.

triNetwork.title: 02. Tri-Network
triNetwork.description: With a strategic three-point network of Seoul Headquarters (Control Tower), Uijeongbu (Real Estate & Family), and Ansan (Foreigners & Labor), we provide region-specific solutions.

globalStandard.title: 03. Global Standard
globalStandard.description: We realize one-stop legal services from communication beyond language barriers to global corporate advisory and visa procedures.

leader.title: Managing Partner
leader.ceoMessage: Law must serve people. Especially at borders, this is even more true.
leader.message: As a scholar and practitioner who has researched immigration control law and foreign policy for decades, I promise you this. From unjust forced deportation, difficult visa issues, to complex property disputes of our neighbors. Sejoong Law Firm will be your strongest shield protecting your rights.
leader.name: Managing Partner / Ph.D. in Law Lee Sang-guk

realEstate.title: Real Estate Disputes
realEstate.description: We professionally resolve various real estate-related legal issues such as real estate contracts, ownership disputes, and lease disputes.
realEstate.ctaDescription: Real estate dispute specialists provide direct consultation.

contract.title: Real Estate Contract Disputes
contract.description: Resolution of disputes related to real estate contracts such as sales contracts, jeonse contracts, and lease contracts

ownership.title: Ownership Disputes
ownership.description: Ownership-related disputes such as registry errors, nominee trusts, and ownership transfers

lease.title: Lease Disputes
lease.description: Lease-related disputes such as jeonse deposit returns, security deposit returns, and contract renewals

construction.title: Construction Disputes
construction.description: Construction-related disputes such as defect repairs, construction delays, and contract terminations

consultation.title: Consultation and Case Analysis
consultation.description: We understand and analyze the overall situation of the case through consultation with the client.

investigation.title: Evidence Collection and Investigation
investigation.description: We collect relevant documents, contracts, and evidence materials and conduct legal review.

strategy.title: Legal Review and Strategy Development
strategy.description: We conduct legal review based on the collected materials and develop a resolution strategy.

negotiation.title: Negotiation and Mediation
negotiation.description: We explore the possibility of mediation through negotiation with the other party.

litigation.title: Litigation (if necessary)
litigation.description: If negotiation is not possible, we protect the client's rights through litigation.

duration.question: How long does a real estate dispute lawsuit take?
duration.answer: It varies depending on the complexity of the case, but generally takes about 6 months to 1 year. Simple cases can be resolved more quickly.

free.question: Is real estate dispute consultation free?
free.answer: Yes, initial consultation is provided free of charge. Through consultation, we understand the overview of the case and present solutions.

types.question: What types of real estate disputes do you handle?
types.answer: We handle all real estate-related legal issues including real estate contract disputes, ownership disputes, lease disputes, and construction disputes.

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.description: Sejoong Law Firm's professional attorneys provide direct consultation.
consultation.subDescription: Please fill out the form below and we will contact you as soon as possible.

direct.title: Direct Consultation with Professional Attorney
direct.description: Experienced professional attorneys provide direct consultation.

fast.title: Fast Response
fast.description: We will contact you within 24 hours after consultation request.

free.title: Free Consultation
free.description: Initial consultation is provided free of charge.

multiple.title: Various Contact Methods
multiple.description: Phone, email, and in-person consultation are all available.

documents.title: Legal Document Generation
documents.description: Easily generate the legal documents you need.
documents.subDescription: You can automatically generate consultation applications, contract review requests, certificate requests, and more.

templates.title: Various Document Templates
templates.description: We provide various legal documents from consultation applications to contracts.

download.title: Instant PDF Download
download.description: You can immediately download the generated document as a PDF.

email.title: Automatic Email Delivery
email.description: Generated documents are automatically sent by email.

review.title: Legal Expert Review
review.description: Generated documents are reviewed by professional attorneys.

noticeItems.review: Generated documents are reviewed by Sejoong Law Firm.
noticeItems.pdf: Documents are downloaded in PDF format.
noticeItems.autoEmail: They are also automatically sent by email.
noticeItems.modification: If additional modifications are needed, you can be guided through consultation.
